author: Free Spirit Coder
title: Dancing in the Rain
description: Dancing in the rain and coding are my two favorite activities. I have designed an app that notifies me when and where the best times to dance in the rain will be. In doing so, I am able to code until my app DIR app alarm goes off and then I head out to Dance In the Rain!

author: SecurityFirst
title: Coding in Code
description: Securing your applications should be your number one priority prior to deployment. All the hours spent on work should be protected so that you can freely share with the world.

author: Compliance Coder
title: CoDiinG is THEEEEE FUTUreE
description: Coding should be taught in school, starting in elementary school. It should be viewed as a second language so that students come out of highschool with a proficiency in a coding language of their choice.
